content:
The bioactive compounds in the proposed chai elixir are:

1. Catechins and EGCG from matcha powder.
2. Gingerols and shogaols from ginger.
3. Curcumin from turmeric.
4. Cinnamaldehyde from cinnamon.
5. Cardamomols from cardamom.
6. Piperine from black pepper.
7. Lycopene from goji berries.
8. Schisandrins from schisandra berries.
9. Resveratrol from fo-ti root.

These compounds have various health benefits, such as antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and immune-boosting properties, among others.
